title: The promoters of the project shall provide adequate facilities for collection and disposal of garbage at their cost, and will keep, at all times, the entire environment clean, neat and hygienic
clause_text: The promoters of the project shall provide adequate facilities for collection and disposal of garbage at their cost, and will keep, at all times, the entire environment clean, neat and hygienic. Area of Rides, whether covered or uncovered, shall not be computed towards FSI.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The promoters of the project shall provide adequate facilities for collection and disposal of garbage at their cost, and will keep, at all times, the entire environment clean, neat and hygienic.
